subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: A 25-yard field goal by Colorado’s Aric Goodman gave the Buffaloes a 17-14 overtime victory. After scoring two touchdowns in the game’s first five minutes, the Buffaloes did not muster another score during regulation.
snippet: A 25-yard field goal by Colorado’s Aric Goodman gave the Buffaloes a 17-14 overtime victory. After scoring two touchdowns in the game’s first five minutes, the Buffaloes did not muster another score during regulation.
